channel.title: [317] Crowns
channel.description:
How do you make it show your crown next to your name when you talk?
Owners can't see their own crown when they talk, but other players can see it.
Admins can see their own crown when they talk, and other players can see it too.
Mods can also see their own crown when they talk. Players can see their crown
This isn't a PI. It's a wL.
EDIT: fixed.
Before: [code=java] out.write(playerRights); // mod level[/code]
After: [code=java]if (playerRights == 3) out.write(2); else out.write(playerRights); // mod level out.write(0); // no log [/code]
-.-

item.title: [317] Crowns
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:

How do you make it show your crown next to your name when you talk?

Owners can’t see their own crown when they talk, but other players can see it.

Admins can see their own crown when they talk, and other players can see it too.

Mods can also see their own crown when they talk. Players can see their crown

This isn’t a PI. It’s a wL.

EDIT: fixed.

Before: out.write(playerRights); // mod level

After: if (playerRights == 3) out.write(2); else out.write(playerRights); // mod level out.write(0); // no log
